title: Champion select
body:
Dear Riot,
When I go into champ select and i have to lock in my champion, I can't click on lock in and it says I've been disconnected. I don't know if there is a solution for this, but this is the third time (both in legacy and new client). I have again a queue of 30 minutes.
Kind regards,
Senpai save me

replies.body: By the sound of it, you might having a connection problem causing you to lose sync and disconnect during champion select.  As this may be a connection situation, the client version you're on won't really play a difference.  Instead, go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
